text:
Hmmm I think VFX right now is probably one of the best industries to be in! from everything I've heard it seems very fun and really rewarding after working so hard! I think that if you have some big names under your belt it will lead to more work, but I also think that if you work hard at a smaller company and do a lot of good work that your name will travel throughout the other companies aswell!

I haven't touched much blues, but I always have a lot of respect for blues players because of the amount of theory they know. Currently I am learning shibuya by a band called covet, it has a lot of 2 handed tapping and its very different to metal ahah#
